price: 66. Ne, tačiau garbinkite Allahą (Vienintelį ir nieko kito), ir būkite tarp dėkingųjų.
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعۡبُدۡ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: bali al-laha fa-uʿ'bud wakun mina al-shākirīna
